宯字的基本解释

宯
xiāo
气上蒸。

宯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《集韻》虚交切，平爻，曉。］
气向上蒸发。

宯字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宯； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页286第02
【廣韻】許交切【集韻】虛交切，?音囂。氣上蒸也。　【集韻】或从穴，亦與庨同。庨字从厂孝聲。宯或从穴作窙，見午集下穴部。

宯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
宯字的起名意思

暂无。

xiāo

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Jiyun" imaginary intersection, flat line, dawn. ]
The gas evaporates upwards.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Liu Zi Department】　Liao; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 286 02
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie [Ji Yun] False intersection, sound clamor. It's steaming on air.　【Jiyun】or Congxue, also the same as 庨. The word 庨 from the factory filial piety. Lao or from acupuncture points, see the lower acupuncture points in Wuji.
